All Classes

Class Description
Controller
The Controller class is the main controller of the main user interface.
CreateUserController
This is a Controller class for the create user -view.
FormattingUtils
FormattingUtils class that holds utility methods for formatting various Locale sensitive elements of the UI
GUIUtils
Utility class to automatically resize TableView columns
IOrderedPortionsDao  
IOrdersDao  
IPortionsDao  
IReservationsDao  
ITablesDao  
IUsersDao  
KitchenController
A Controller class to control the Kitchen -tab in the JavaFX User interface.
LanguageUtils
Utility class, that hold methods and properties for formatting different elements of the UI based on Locale.
LoginController
This is the Controller class for login-view.
MainApp
This is the MainClass of the project, which contains main-method and methods to switch UI-views.
MainInformationController
MainInformationController class is handles the events and data related to the main information panel.
Model
This is a class that is used as a intermediary data storage, to provide the controllers access to database and to start a timer for ModelHelper.
ModelHelper
Helper class for the model.
NewMain  
OrderedPortionsDao
Data Access Object for performing CRUD on OrderedPortions table and returning OrderedPortionsEntity -objects when applicable.
OrderedPortionsEntity
A POJO with Annotations for Hibernate.
OrdersDao
Data Access Object for performing CRUD on Orders table and returning OrdersEntity -objects when applicable.
OrdersEntity
A POJO with Annotations for Hibernate.
PasswordUtils
A class for checking Login information.
PortionsController
Controller class for the Portions tab of the user interface.
PortionsDao
Data Access Object for performing CRUD on Portions table and returning PortionsEntity -objects when applicable.
PortionsEntity
A POJO with Annotations for Hibernate.
ReservationListController
ReservationListController class handles the data and events related to the reservation list view.
ReservationsDao
Data Access Object for performing CRUD on Reservations table and returning ReservationsEntity -objects when applicable.
ReservationsEntity
A POJO with Annotations for Hibernate.
SettingUtils  
TableInformationController
TableInformationController handles all the data and events related to table information panel.
TablesDao
Data Access Object for performing CRUD on Tables table and returning TablesEntity -objects when applicable.
TablesEntity
A POJO with Annotations for Hibernate.
UsersDao
Data Access Object for performing CRUD on Users table and returning UsersEntity -objects when applicable.
UsersEntity
A POJO with Annotations for Hibernate.
WaiterController
Controller class for the Waiter view.
